North Korea's Kim warns failure to provide food a 'serious political issue'North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has called for ways to be found to improve economic development after saying that a failure to provide people with basic living necessities including food is a "serious political issue", state media reported on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 00:16:41 GMT TZOYAZWJXVOYNMIGMJ5QKDIYSY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-warns-failure-provide-food-serious-political-issue-2024-01-25/Hyunsu Yim世界亚太地区
Court clears path for Brazil to renew energy distribution concessionsA Brazilian court on Wednesday cleared a hurdle for the government's renewal of concessions contracts representing 60% of the energy distribution market in South America's largest country.
